bug.author: hhsecond
bug.description: bash get_deps.sh gpu triggers an error while fetching libtorch. I am assuming this URL is wrong https://s3.amazonaws.com/redismodules/pytorch/libtorch-cu100-linux-x86_64-1.2.0.tar.gz Also bash get_deps.sh is not taking gpu as the default argument. Is that intentional?
